pkgmetadata.longdescription: # nova-backtest**NovaLabs backtest** is a Python library for backtesting algorithmic trading strategies. It aims to facilitate the development of algorithmic trading on the**crypto market** by downloading historical data prices on the biggest centralizedexchanges (Binance, Bybit, OKX, KuCoin & more) and simulates the trades ofa given strategy throughout past years. It returns a bunch of statistics, giving astrong evaluation of your strategies performances.
